title: BWW Apps - Photo Gallery
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to be able to use this app.
labelOptions: What would you like to do?
optionsScreenReaderTxt: Information about available activities for this app.
optionsList:
• Upload allows you to add new photos to your collection.
  • Delete allows you to remove photos from your collection.
  • View Slideshow allows you to watch your photos appear and disappear from the screen in a graphically pleasing manner.
errorFileType: Error: Please only upload jpeg or png image files.
errorSelectImg: Error: Please select an image to upload.
